CheckTitle: The endpoint protection for all Virtual Machines is installed
Description:
Installing **endpoint protection systems** (like **Security Center** for Alibaba Cloud) provides real-time protection capability that helps identify and remove viruses, spyware, and other malicious software.

Configurable alerts notify when known malicious software attempts to install itself or run on ECS instances.
Risk:
ECS instances without **endpoint protection** are vulnerable to **malware**, **viruses**, and other security threats.

Endpoint protection provides real-time monitoring and protection capabilities essential for detecting and preventing security incidents.

Code.CLI: Logon to Security Center Console > Select Settings > Click Agent > Select virtual machines without Security Center agent > Click Install

Recommendation.Text:
1. Log on to the **Security Center Console**
2. Select **Settings**
3. Click **Agent**
4. On the Agent tab, select the virtual machines without Security Center agent installed
5. Click **Install**
